segments.text: It ’ s time for me to go now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Would you like me to go with you ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d rather you stayed in the office and did these things .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to type that letter ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d rather you typed it .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to tell her ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ d rather you told her .
segments.speaker: S1
